3 days on the road with PayPal Part 3: Features and agency partners

Part 3 explores PayPals evolution from a simple checkout option to a strategic commerce platform. It highlights new features, deeper Shopware integration, and agency programs that help merchants boost conversion and unify online and offline payments.

Read more
Developer insights
18/12/2025

The new caching system

Shopware's new caching system reduces permutations, caches for logged-in users and the Store API, and provides granular control. This delivers faster page loads, higher cache hit rates, and better reverse proxy support.

Read more

Shopware Services just got better!

Shopware Services, based on the Shopware App system, are a new way to deliver functionality made by Shopware to shops using Shopware. Read this blog post to learn about changes implemented that make Services and the App system even more secure and robust.
